exceptions.tactic: intros aP R Q a b H1 H2 H3 c Q1 H4 H5 H6 H7.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce redIn to an evaluable reference.
The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.
The reference Q was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In a nil H0 : In b nil c : poly A0 eqA ltM Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : redIn a b nil (c :: Q1) R H2 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM c) (pO A n) H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R (pO A n) Unable to unify "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM c) (pO A n)" with "In (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) Q1".
The reference Q was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In a (p :: aP) H0 : In b (p :: aP) c : poly A0 eqA ltM Q1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : redIn a b (p :: aP) (c :: Q1) R H2 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM c) (pO A n) H4 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec R (pO A n) Unable to unify "redIn a b (p :: aP) (c :: Q1) R" with "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) R".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros aP R Q a b H1 H2 H3 c Q1 H4 H5 H6 H7. unfold redIn in H3. destruct H3. - apply redIn0 with (Q:=Q). apply H2. - apply redIn1 with (Q:=Q). apply H1. - injection H5 as H8 H9. rewrite <- H8 in H6. apply H9.
